00022 b3GpuNarrowPhase::b3GpuNarrowPhase(cl_context ctx, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue, const b3Config& config)
00023 :m_data(0) ,m_planeBodyIndex(-1),m_static0Index(-1),

00036

00048         m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU = new b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData>();

00052         m_data->m_inertiaBufferCPU->resize(config.m_maxConvexBodies);

00137         delete m_data->m_convexPolyhedraGPU;

00148

00152         }
00153         for (int i=0;i<m_data->m_meshInterfaces.size();i++)
00154         {
00155                 delete m_data->m_meshInterfaces[i];
00156         }
00157         m_data->m_meshInterfaces.clear();

00167 
00168 int     b3GpuNarrowPhase::allocateCollidable()
00169 {
00170         int curSize = m_data->m_collidablesCPU.size();
00171         if (curSize<m_data->m_config.m_maxConvexShapes)
00172         {
00173                 m_data->m_collidablesCPU.expand();
00174                 return curSize;
00175         }
00176         else
00177         {
00178                 b3Error("allocateCollidable out-of-range %d\n",m_data->m_config.m_maxConvexShapes);
00179         }
00180         return -1;
00181 
00182 }

00188 int             b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerSphereShape(float radius)
00189 {
00190         int collidableIndex = allocateCollidable();
00191         if (collidableIndex<0)
00192                 return collidableIndex;
00193 
00194 
00195         b3Collidable& col = getCollidableCpu(collidableIndex);
00196         col.m_shapeType = SHAPE_SPHERE;
00197         col.m_shapeIndex = 0;
00198         col.m_radius = radius;
00199         
00200         if (col.m_shapeIndex>=0)
00201         {
00202                 b3SapAabb aabb;
00203                 b3Vector3 myAabbMin=b3MakeVector3(-radius,-radius,-radius);
00204                 b3Vector3 myAabbMax=b3MakeVector3(radius,radius,radius);
00205 
00206                 aabb.m_min[0] = myAabbMin[0];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_min.x;
00207                 aabb.m_min[1] = myAabbMin[1];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_min.y;
00208                 aabb.m_min[2] = myAabbMin[2];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_min.z;
00209                 aabb.m_minIndices[3] = 0;
00210 
00211                 aabb.m_max[0] = myAabbMax[0];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_max.x;
00212                 aabb.m_max[1] = myAabbMax[1];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_max.y;
00213                 aabb.m_max[2] = myAabbMax[2];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_max.z;
00214                 aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = 0;
00215 
00216                 m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->push_back(aabb);
00217 //              m_data->m_localShapeAABBGPU->push_back(aabb);
00218                 clFinish(m_queue);
00219         }
00220         
00221         return collidableIndex;
00222 }

00224 
00225 int b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerFace(const b3Vector3& faceNormal, float faceConstant)
00226 {
00227         int faceOffset = m_data->m_convexFaces.size();
00228         b3GpuFace& face = m_data->m_convexFaces.expand();
00229         face.m_plane = b3MakeVector3(faceNormal.x,faceNormal.y,faceNormal.z,faceConstant);
00230         return faceOffset;
00231 }
00232 
00233 int             b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerPlaneShape(const b3Vector3& planeNormal, float planeConstant)
00234 {
00235         int collidableIndex = allocateCollidable();
00236         if (collidableIndex<0)
00237                 return collidableIndex;
00238 
00239 
00240         b3Collidable& col = getCollidableCpu(collidableIndex);
00241         col.m_shapeType = SHAPE_PLANE;
00242         col.m_shapeIndex = registerFace(planeNormal,planeConstant);
00243         col.m_radius = planeConstant;
00244         
00245         if (col.m_shapeIndex>=0)
00246         {
00247                 b3SapAabb aabb;
00248                 aabb.m_min[0] = -1e30f;
00249                 aabb.m_min[1] = -1e30f;
00250                 aabb.m_min[2] = -1e30f;
00251                 aabb.m_minIndices[3] = 0;
00252                 
00253                 aabb.m_max[0] = 1e30f;
00254                 aabb.m_max[1] = 1e30f;
00255                 aabb.m_max[2] = 1e30f;
00256                 aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = 0;
00257 
00258                 m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->push_back(aabb);
00259 //              m_data->m_localShapeAABBGPU->push_back(aabb);
00260                 clFinish(m_queue);
00261         }
00262         
00263         return collidableIndex;
00264 }

00266 
00267 int b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerConvexHullShapeInternal(b3ConvexUtility* convexPtr,b3Collidable& col)
00268 {
00269 
00270         m_data->m_convexData->resize(m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes+1);
00271         m_data->m_convexPolyhedra.resize(m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes+1);
00272         
00273     
00274         b3ConvexPolyhedronData& convex = m_data->m_convexPolyhedra.at(m_data->m_convexPolyhedra.size()-1);
00275         convex.mC = convexPtr->mC;
00276         convex.mE = convexPtr->mE;
00277         convex.m_extents= convexPtr->m_extents;
00278         convex.m_localCenter = convexPtr->m_localCenter;
00279         convex.m_radius = convexPtr->m_radius;
00280         
00281         convex.m_numUniqueEdges = convexPtr->m_uniqueEdges.size();
00282         int edgeOffset = m_data->m_uniqueEdges.size();
00283         convex.m_uniqueEdgesOffset = edgeOffset;
00284         
00285         m_data->m_uniqueEdges.resize(edgeOffset+convex.m_numUniqueEdges);
00286     
00287         //convex data here
00288         int i;
00289         for ( i=0;i<convexPtr->m_uniqueEdges.size();i++)
00290         {
00291                 m_data->m_uniqueEdges[edgeOffset+i] = convexPtr->m_uniqueEdges[i];
00292         }
00293     
00294         int faceOffset = m_data->m_convexFaces.size();
00295         convex.m_faceOffset = faceOffset;
00296         convex.m_numFaces = convexPtr->m_faces.size();
00297 
00298         m_data->m_convexFaces.resize(faceOffset+convex.m_numFaces);
00299         
00300 
00301         for (i=0;i<convexPtr->m_faces.size();i++)
00302         {
00303                 m_data->m_convexFaces[convex.m_faceOffset+i].m_plane = b3MakeVector3(convexPtr->m_faces[i].m_plane[0],
00304                                                                                                                                                         convexPtr->m_faces[i].m_plane[1],
00305                                                                                                                                                         convexPtr->m_faces[i].m_plane[2],
00306                                                                                                                                                         convexPtr->m_faces[i].m_plane[3]);
00307 
00308                 
00309                 int indexOffset = m_data->m_convexIndices.size();
00310                 int numIndices = convexPtr->m_faces[i].m_indices.size();
00311                 m_data->m_convexFaces[convex.m_faceOffset+i].m_numIndices = numIndices;
00312                 m_data->m_convexFaces[convex.m_faceOffset+i].m_indexOffset = indexOffset;
00313                 m_data->m_convexIndices.resize(indexOffset+numIndices);
00314                 for (int p=0;p<numIndices;p++)
00315                 {
00316                         m_data->m_convexIndices[indexOffset+p] = convexPtr->m_faces[i].m_indices[p];
00317                 }
00318         }
00319     
00320         convex.m_numVertices = convexPtr->m_vertices.size();
00321         int vertexOffset = m_data->m_convexVertices.size();
00322         convex.m_vertexOffset =vertexOffset;
00323         
00324         m_data->m_convexVertices.resize(vertexOffset+convex.m_numVertices);
00325         for (int i=0;i<convexPtr->m_vertices.size();i++)
00326         {
00327                 m_data->m_convexVertices[vertexOffset+i] = convexPtr->m_vertices[i];
00328         }
00329 
00330         (*m_data->m_convexData)[m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes] = convexPtr;
00331         
00332     
00333     
00334         return m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes++;
00335 }

00337 
00338 int             b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerConvexHullShape(const float* vertices, int strideInBytes, int numVertices, const float* scaling)
00339 {
00340         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3> verts;
00341 
00342         unsigned char* vts = (unsigned char*) vertices;
00343         for (int i=0;i<numVertices;i++)
00344         {
00345                 float* vertex = (float*) &vts[i*strideInBytes];
00346                 verts.push_back(b3MakeVector3(vertex[0]*scaling[0],vertex[1]*scaling[1],vertex[2]*scaling[2]));
00347         }
00348 
00349         b3ConvexUtility* utilPtr = new b3ConvexUtility();
00350         bool merge = true;
00351         if (numVertices)
00352         {
00353                 utilPtr->initializePolyhedralFeatures(&verts[0],verts.size(),merge);
00354         }
00355 
00356         int collidableIndex = registerConvexHullShape(utilPtr);
00357         delete utilPtr;
00358         return collidableIndex;
00359 }
00360 
00361 int             b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerConvexHullShape(b3ConvexUtility* utilPtr)
00362 {
00363         int collidableIndex = allocateCollidable();
00364         if (collidableIndex<0)
00365                 return collidableIndex;
00366 
00367         b3Collidable& col = getCollidableCpu(collidableIndex);
00368         col.m_shapeType = SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL;
00369         col.m_shapeIndex = -1;
00370         
00371         
00372         {
00373                 b3Vector3 localCenter=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00374                 for (int i=0;i<utilPtr->m_vertices.size();i++)
00375                         localCenter+=utilPtr->m_vertices[i];
00376                 localCenter*= (1.f/utilPtr->m_vertices.size());
00377                 utilPtr->m_localCenter = localCenter;
00378 
00379                 col.m_shapeIndex = registerConvexHullShapeInternal(utilPtr,col);
00380         }
00381 
00382         if (col.m_shapeIndex>=0)
00383         {
00384                 b3SapAabb aabb;
00385                 
00386                 b3Vector3 myAabbMin=b3MakeVector3(1e30f,1e30f,1e30f);
00387                 b3Vector3 myAabbMax=b3MakeVector3(-1e30f,-1e30f,-1e30f);
00388 
00389                 for (int i=0;i<utilPtr->m_vertices.size();i++)
00390                 {
00391                         myAabbMin.setMin(utilPtr->m_vertices[i]);
00392                         myAabbMax.setMax(utilPtr->m_vertices[i]);
00393                 }
00394                 aabb.m_min[0] = myAabbMin[0];
00395                 aabb.m_min[1] = myAabbMin[1];
00396                 aabb.m_min[2] = myAabbMin[2];
00397                 aabb.m_minIndices[3] = 0;
00398 
00399                 aabb.m_max[0] = myAabbMax[0];
00400                 aabb.m_max[1] = myAabbMax[1];
00401                 aabb.m_max[2] = myAabbMax[2];
00402                 aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = 0;
00403 
00404                 m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->push_back(aabb);
00405 //              m_data->m_localShapeAABBGPU->push_back(aabb);
00406         }
00407         
00408         return collidableIndex;
00409 
00410 }
00411 
00412 int             b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerCompoundShape(b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuChildShape>* childShapes)
00413 {
00414         
00415         int collidableIndex = allocateCollidable();
00416         if (collidableIndex<0)
00417                 return collidableIndex;
00418 
00419         b3Collidable& col = getCollidableCpu(collidableIndex);
00420         col.m_shapeType = SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS;
00421         col.m_shapeIndex = m_data->m_cpuChildShapes.size();
00422         col.m_compoundBvhIndex = m_data->m_bvhInfoCPU.size();
00423 
00424         {
00425                 b3Assert(col.m_shapeIndex+childShapes->size()<m_data->m_config.m_maxCompoundChildShapes);
00426                 for (int i=0;i<childShapes->size();i++)
00427                 {
00428                         m_data->m_cpuChildShapes.push_back(childShapes->at(i));
00429                 }
00430         }
00431 
00432 
00433 
00434         col.m_numChildShapes = childShapes->size();
00435         
00436         
00437         b3SapAabb aabbLocalSpace;
00438         b3Vector3 myAabbMin=b3MakeVector3(1e30f,1e30f,1e30f);
00439         b3Vector3 myAabbMax=b3MakeVector3(-1e30f,-1e30f,-1e30f);
00440         
00441         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Aabb> childLocalAabbs;
00442         childLocalAabbs.resize(childShapes->size());
00443 
00444         //compute local AABB of the compound of all children
00445         for (int i=0;i<childShapes->size();i++)
00446         {
00447                 int childColIndex = childShapes->at(i).m_shapeIndex;
00448                 //b3Collidable& childCol = getCollidableCpu(childColIndex);
00449                 b3SapAabb aabbLoc =m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->at(childColIndex);
00450 
00451                 b3Vector3 childLocalAabbMin=b3MakeVector3(aabbLoc.m_min[0],aabbLoc.m_min[1],aabbLoc.m_min[2]);
00452                 b3Vector3 childLocalAabbMax=b3MakeVector3(aabbLoc.m_max[0],aabbLoc.m_max[1],aabbLoc.m_max[2]);
00453                 b3Vector3 aMin,aMax;
00454                 b3Scalar margin(0.f);
00455                 b3Transform childTr;
00456                 childTr.setIdentity();
00457 
00458                 childTr.setOrigin(childShapes->at(i).m_childPosition);
00459                 childTr.setRotation(b3Quaternion(childShapes->at(i).m_childOrientation));
00460                 b3TransformAabb(childLocalAabbMin,childLocalAabbMax,margin,childTr,aMin,aMax);
00461                 myAabbMin.setMin(aMin);
00462                 myAabbMax.setMax(aMax);         
00463                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_min[0] = aMin[0];
00464                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_min[1] = aMin[1];
00465                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_min[2] = aMin[2];
00466                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_min[3] = 0;
00467                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_max[0] = aMax[0];
00468                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_max[1] = aMax[1];
00469                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_max[2] = aMax[2];
00470                 childLocalAabbs[i].m_max[3] = 0;
00471         }
00472         
00473         aabbLocalSpace.m_min[0] = myAabbMin[0];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_min.x;
00474         aabbLocalSpace.m_min[1]= myAabbMin[1];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_min.y;
00475         aabbLocalSpace.m_min[2]= myAabbMin[2];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_min.z;
00476         aabbLocalSpace.m_minIndices[3] = 0;
00477         
00478         aabbLocalSpace.m_max[0] = myAabbMax[0];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_max.x;
00479         aabbLocalSpace.m_max[1]= myAabbMax[1];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_max.y;
00480         aabbLocalSpace.m_max[2]= myAabbMax[2];//s_convexHeightField->m_aabb.m_max.z;
00481         aabbLocalSpace.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = 0;
00482         
00483         m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->push_back(aabbLocalSpace);
00484 
00485 
00486         b3QuantizedBvh* bvh = new b3QuantizedBvh;
00487         bvh->setQuantizationValues(myAabbMin,myAabbMax);
00488         QuantizedNodeArray&     nodes = bvh->getLeafNodeArray();
00489         int numNodes = childShapes->size();
00490 
00491         for (int i=0;i<numNodes;i++)
00492         {
00493                 b3QuantizedBvhNode node;
00494                 b3Vector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
00495                 aabbMin = (b3Vector3&) childLocalAabbs[i].m_min;
00496                 aabbMax = (b3Vector3&) childLocalAabbs[i].m_max;
00497 
00498                 bvh->quantize(&node.m_quantizedAabbMin[0],aabbMin,0);
00499                 bvh->quantize(&node.m_quantizedAabbMax[0],aabbMax,1);
00500                 int partId = 0;
00501                 node.m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex = (partId<<(31-MAX_NUM_PARTS_IN_BITS)) | i;
00502                 nodes.push_back(node);
00503         }
00504         bvh->buildInternal();
00505 
00506         int numSubTrees = bvh->getSubtreeInfoArray().size();
00507 
00508         //void  setQuantizationValues(const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMin,const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMax,b3Scalar quantizationMargin=b3Scalar(1.0));
00509         //QuantizedNodeArray&   getLeafNodeArray() {                    return  m_quantizedLeafNodes;   }
00511         //void  buildInternal();
00512 
00513         b3BvhInfo bvhInfo;
00514         
00515         bvhInfo.m_aabbMin = bvh->m_bvhAabbMin;
00516         bvhInfo.m_aabbMax = bvh->m_bvhAabbMax;
00517         bvhInfo.m_quantization = bvh->m_bvhQuantization;
00518         bvhInfo.m_numNodes = numNodes;
00519         bvhInfo.m_numSubTrees = numSubTrees;
00520         bvhInfo.m_nodeOffset = m_data->m_treeNodesCPU.size();
00521         bvhInfo.m_subTreeOffset = m_data->m_subTreesCPU.size();
00522 
00523         int numNewNodes =               bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray().size();
00524 
00525         for (int i=0;i<numNewNodes-1;i++)
00526         {
00527 
00528                 if (bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray()[i].isLeafNode())
00529                 {
00530                         int orgIndex = bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray()[i].getTriangleIndex();
00531 
00532                         b3Vector3 nodeMinVec = bvh->unQuantize(bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray()[i].m_quantizedAabbMin);
00533                         b3Vector3 nodeMaxVec = bvh->unQuantize(bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray()[i].m_quantizedAabbMax);
00534                 
00535                         for (int c=0;c<3;c++)
00536                         {
00537                                 if (childLocalAabbs[orgIndex].m_min[c] < nodeMinVec[c])
00538                                 {
00539                                         printf("min org (%f) and new (%f) ? at i:%d,c:%d\n",childLocalAabbs[i].m_min[c],nodeMinVec[c],i,c);
00540                                 }
00541                                 if (childLocalAabbs[orgIndex].m_max[c] > nodeMaxVec[c])
00542                                 {
00543                                         printf("max org (%f) and new (%f) ? at i:%d,c:%d\n",childLocalAabbs[i].m_max[c],nodeMaxVec[c],i,c);
00544                                 }
00545 
00546                         }
00547                 }
00548 
00549         }
00550 
00551         m_data->m_bvhInfoCPU.push_back(bvhInfo);
00552 
00553         int numNewSubtrees = bvh->getSubtreeInfoArray().size();
00554         m_data->m_subTreesCPU.reserve(m_data->m_subTreesCPU.size()+numNewSubtrees);
00555         for (int i=0;i<numNewSubtrees;i++)
00556         {
00557                 m_data->m_subTreesCPU.push_back(bvh->getSubtreeInfoArray()[i]);
00558         }
00559         int numNewTreeNodes = bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray().size();
00560 
00561         for (int i=0;i<numNewTreeNodes;i++)
00562         {
00563                 m_data->m_treeNodesCPU.push_back(bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray()[i]);
00564         }
00565 
00566 //      m_data->m_localShapeAABBGPU->push_back(aabbWS);
00567         clFinish(m_queue);
00568         return collidableIndex;
00569         
00570 }
00571 
00572 
00573 int             b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerConcaveMesh(b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>* vertices, b3AlignedObjectArray<int>* indices,const float* scaling1)
00574 {
00575         
00576 
00577         b3Vector3 scaling=b3MakeVector3(scaling1[0],scaling1[1],scaling1[2]);
00578 
00579         int collidableIndex = allocateCollidable();
00580         if (collidableIndex<0)
00581                 return collidableIndex;
00582 
00583         b3Collidable& col = getCollidableCpu(collidableIndex);
00584         
00585         col.m_shapeType = SHAPE_CONCAVE_TRIMESH;
00586         col.m_shapeIndex = registerConcaveMeshShape(vertices,indices,col,scaling);
00587         col.m_bvhIndex = m_data->m_bvhInfoCPU.size();
00588                 
00589 
00590         b3SapAabb aabb;
00591         b3Vector3 myAabbMin=b3MakeVector3(1e30f,1e30f,1e30f);
00592         b3Vector3 myAabbMax=b3MakeVector3(-1e30f,-1e30f,-1e30f);
00593 
00594         for (int i=0;i<vertices->size();i++)
00595         {
00596                 b3Vector3 vtx(vertices->at(i)*scaling);
00597                 myAabbMin.setMin(vtx);
00598                 myAabbMax.setMax(vtx);
00599         }
00600         aabb.m_min[0] = myAabbMin[0];
00601         aabb.m_min[1] = myAabbMin[1];
00602         aabb.m_min[2] = myAabbMin[2];
00603         aabb.m_minIndices[3] = 0;
00604 
00605         aabb.m_max[0] = myAabbMax[0];
00606         aabb.m_max[1]= myAabbMax[1];
00607         aabb.m_max[2]= myAabbMax[2];
00608         aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3]= 0;
00609 
00610         m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->push_back(aabb);
00611 //      m_data->m_localShapeAABBGPU->push_back(aabb);
00612 
00613         b3OptimizedBvh* bvh = new b3OptimizedBvh();
00614         //void b3OptimizedBvh::build(b3StridingMeshInterface* triangles, bool useQuantizedAabbCompression, const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMin, const b3Vector3& bvhAabbMax)
00615         
00616         bool useQuantizedAabbCompression = true;
00617         b3TriangleIndexVertexArray* meshInterface=new b3TriangleIndexVertexArray();
00618         m_data->m_meshInterfaces.push_back(meshInterface);
00619         b3IndexedMesh mesh;
00620         mesh.m_numTriangles = indices->size()/3;
00621         mesh.m_numVertices = vertices->size();
00622         mesh.m_vertexBase = (const unsigned char *)&vertices->at(0).x;
00623         mesh.m_vertexStride = sizeof(b3Vector3);
00624         mesh.m_triangleIndexStride = 3 * sizeof(int);// or sizeof(int)
00625         mesh.m_triangleIndexBase = (const unsigned char *)&indices->at(0);
00626         
00627         meshInterface->addIndexedMesh(mesh);
00628         bvh->build(meshInterface, useQuantizedAabbCompression, (b3Vector3&)aabb.m_min, (b3Vector3&)aabb.m_max);
00629         m_data->m_bvhData.push_back(bvh);
00630         int numNodes = bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray().size();
00631         //b3OpenCLArray<b3QuantizedBvhNode>*    treeNodesGPU = new b3OpenCLArray<b3QuantizedBvhNode>(this->m_context,this->m_queue,numNodes);
00632         int numSubTrees = bvh->getSubtreeInfoArray().size();
00633 
00634         b3BvhInfo bvhInfo;
00635         
00636         bvhInfo.m_aabbMin = bvh->m_bvhAabbMin;
00637         bvhInfo.m_aabbMax = bvh->m_bvhAabbMax;
00638         bvhInfo.m_quantization = bvh->m_bvhQuantization;
00639         bvhInfo.m_numNodes = numNodes;
00640         bvhInfo.m_numSubTrees = numSubTrees;
00641         bvhInfo.m_nodeOffset = m_data->m_treeNodesCPU.size();
00642         bvhInfo.m_subTreeOffset = m_data->m_subTreesCPU.size();
00643 
00644         m_data->m_bvhInfoCPU.push_back(bvhInfo);
00645 
00646 
00647         int numNewSubtrees = bvh->getSubtreeInfoArray().size();
00648         m_data->m_subTreesCPU.reserve(m_data->m_subTreesCPU.size()+numNewSubtrees);
00649         for (int i=0;i<numNewSubtrees;i++)
00650         {
00651                 m_data->m_subTreesCPU.push_back(bvh->getSubtreeInfoArray()[i]);
00652         }
00653         int numNewTreeNodes = bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray().size();
00654 
00655         for (int i=0;i<numNewTreeNodes;i++)
00656         {
00657                 m_data->m_treeNodesCPU.push_back(bvh->getQuantizedNodeArray()[i]);
00658         }
00659 
00660 
00661 
00662 
00663         return collidableIndex;
00664 }
00665 
00666 int b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerConcaveMeshShape(b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>* vertices, b3AlignedObjectArray<int>* indices,b3Collidable& col, const float* scaling1)
00667 {
00668 
00669 
00670         b3Vector3 scaling=b3MakeVector3(scaling1[0],scaling1[1],scaling1[2]);
00671 
00672         m_data->m_convexData->resize(m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes+1);
00673         m_data->m_convexPolyhedra.resize(m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes+1);
00674         
00675     
00676         b3ConvexPolyhedronData& convex = m_data->m_convexPolyhedra.at(m_data->m_convexPolyhedra.size()-1);
00677         convex.mC = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00678         convex.mE = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00679         convex.m_extents= b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00680         convex.m_localCenter = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00681         convex.m_radius = 0.f;
00682         
00683         convex.m_numUniqueEdges = 0;
00684         int edgeOffset = m_data->m_uniqueEdges.size();
00685         convex.m_uniqueEdgesOffset = edgeOffset;
00686         
00687         int faceOffset = m_data->m_convexFaces.size();
00688         convex.m_faceOffset = faceOffset;
00689         
00690         convex.m_numFaces = indices->size()/3;
00691         m_data->m_convexFaces.resize(faceOffset+convex.m_numFaces);
00692         m_data->m_convexIndices.reserve(convex.m_numFaces*3);
00693         for (int i=0;i<convex.m_numFaces;i++)
00694         {
00695                 if (i%256==0)
00696                 {
00697                         //printf("i=%d out of %d", i,convex.m_numFaces);
00698                 }
00699                 b3Vector3 vert0(vertices->at(indices->at(i*3))*scaling);
00700                 b3Vector3 vert1(vertices->at(indices->at(i*3+1))*scaling);
00701                 b3Vector3 vert2(vertices->at(indices->at(i*3+2))*scaling);
00702 
00703                 b3Vector3 normal = ((vert1-vert0).cross(vert2-vert0)).normalize();
00704                 b3Scalar c = -(normal.dot(vert0));
00705 
00706                 m_data->m_convexFaces[convex.m_faceOffset+i].m_plane = b3MakeVector4(normal.x,normal.y,normal.z,c);
00707                 int indexOffset = m_data->m_convexIndices.size();
00708                 int numIndices = 3;
00709                 m_data->m_convexFaces[convex.m_faceOffset+i].m_numIndices = numIndices;
00710                 m_data->m_convexFaces[convex.m_faceOffset+i].m_indexOffset = indexOffset;
00711                 m_data->m_convexIndices.resize(indexOffset+numIndices);
00712                 for (int p=0;p<numIndices;p++)
00713                 {
00714                         int vi = indices->at(i*3+p);
00715                         m_data->m_convexIndices[indexOffset+p] = vi;//convexPtr->m_faces[i].m_indices[p];
00716                 }
00717         }
00718     
00719         convex.m_numVertices = vertices->size();
00720         int vertexOffset = m_data->m_convexVertices.size();
00721         convex.m_vertexOffset =vertexOffset;
00722         m_data->m_convexVertices.resize(vertexOffset+convex.m_numVertices);
00723         for (int i=0;i<vertices->size();i++)
00724         {
00725                 m_data->m_convexVertices[vertexOffset+i] = vertices->at(i)*scaling;
00726         }
00727 
00728         (*m_data->m_convexData)[m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes] = 0;
00729         
00730   
00731         return m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes++;
00732 }

00822         return &m_data->m_pBufContactOutCPU->at(0);
00823 }
00824 
00825 void b3GpuNarrowPhase::computeContacts(cl_mem broadphasePairs, int numBroadphasePairs, cl_mem aabbsWorldSpace, int numObjects)
00826 {
00827 
00828         cl_mem aabbsLocalSpace = m_data->m_localShapeAABBGPU->getBufferCL();
00829 
00830         int nContactOut = 0;
00831 
00832         //swap buffer
00833         m_data->m_currentContactBuffer=1-m_data->m_currentContactBuffer;
00834 
00835         //int curSize = m_data->m_pBufContactBuffersGPU[m_data->m_currentContactBuffer]->size();
00836 
00837         int maxTriConvexPairCapacity = m_data->m_config.m_maxTriConvexPairCapacity;
00838         int numTriConvexPairsOut=0;
00839         
00840         b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4> broadphasePairsGPU(m_context,m_queue);
00841         broadphasePairsGPU.setFromOpenCLBuffer(broadphasePairs,numBroadphasePairs);
00842 
00843         
00844 
00845 
00846         b3OpenCLArray<b3Aabb> clAabbArrayWorldSpace(this->m_context,this->m_queue);
00847         clAabbArrayWorldSpace.setFromOpenCLBuffer(aabbsWorldSpace,numObjects);
00848 
00849         b3OpenCLArray<b3Aabb> clAabbArrayLocalSpace(this->m_context,this->m_queue);
00850         clAabbArrayLocalSpace.setFromOpenCLBuffer(aabbsLocalSpace,numObjects);
00851 
00852         m_data->m_gpuSatCollision->computeConvexConvexContactsGPUSAT(
00853                 &broadphasePairsGPU, numBroadphasePairs,
00854                 m_data->m_bodyBufferGPU,
00855                 m_data->m_pBufContactBuffersGPU[m_data->m_currentContactBuffer],
00856                 nContactOut,
00857                 m_data->m_pBufContactBuffersGPU[1-m_data->m_currentContactBuffer],
00858                 m_data->m_config.m_maxContactCapacity,
00859                 m_data->m_config.m_compoundPairCapacity,
00860                 *m_data->m_convexPolyhedraGPU,
00861                 *m_data->m_convexVerticesGPU,
00862                 *m_data->m_uniqueEdgesGPU,
00863                 *m_data->m_convexFacesGPU,
00864                 *m_data->m_convexIndicesGPU,
00865                 *m_data->m_collidablesGPU,
00866                 *m_data->m_gpuChildShapes,
00867                 clAabbArrayWorldSpace,
00868                 clAabbArrayLocalSpace,
00869                 *m_data->m_worldVertsB1GPU,
00870                 *m_data->m_clippingFacesOutGPU,
00871                 *m_data->m_worldNormalsAGPU,
00872                 *m_data->m_worldVertsA1GPU,
00873                 *m_data->m_worldVertsB2GPU,
00874                 m_data->m_bvhData,
00875                 m_data->m_treeNodesGPU,
00876                 m_data->m_subTreesGPU,
00877                 m_data->m_bvhInfoGPU,
00878                 numObjects,
00879                 maxTriConvexPairCapacity,
00880                 *m_data->m_triangleConvexPairs,
00881                 numTriConvexPairsOut
00882                 );
00883 
00884         /*b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int4> broadphasePairsCPU;
00885         broadphasePairsGPU.copyToHost(broadphasePairsCPU);
00886         printf("checking pairs\n");
00887         */
00888 }
00889 
00890 const b3SapAabb& b3GpuNarrowPhase::getLocalSpaceAabb(int collidableIndex) const
00891 {
00892         return m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->at(collidableIndex);
00893 }

00895 
00896 
00897 
00898 
00899 int b3GpuNarrowPhase::registerRigidBody(int collidableIndex, float mass, const float* position, const float* orientation , const float* aabbMinPtr, const float* aabbMaxPtr,bool writeToGpu)
00900 {
00901         b3Vector3 aabbMin=b3MakeVector3(aabbMinPtr[0],aabbMinPtr[1],aabbMinPtr[2]);
00902         b3Vector3 aabbMax=b3MakeVector3(aabbMaxPtr[0],aabbMaxPtr[1],aabbMaxPtr[2]);
00903         
00904 
00905         if (m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies >= (m_data->m_config.m_maxConvexBodies))
00906         {
00907                 b3Error("registerRigidBody: exceeding the number of rigid bodies, %d > %d \n",m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies,m_data->m_config.m_maxConvexBodies);
00908                 return -1;
00909         }
00910     
00911         m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->resize(m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies+1);
00912     
00913         b3RigidBodyData& body = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
00914     
00915         float friction = 1.f;
00916         float restitution = 0.f;
00917     
00918         body.m_frictionCoeff = friction;
00919         body.m_restituitionCoeff = restitution;
00920         body.m_angVel = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00921         body.m_linVel=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);//.setZero();
00922         body.m_pos =b3MakeVector3(position[0],position[1],position[2]);
00923         body.m_quat.setValue(orientation[0],orientation[1],orientation[2],orientation[3]);
00924         body.m_collidableIdx = collidableIndex;
00925         if (collidableIndex>=0)
00926         {
00927 //              body.m_shapeType = m_data->m_collidablesCPU.at(collidableIndex).m_shapeType;
00928         } else
00929         {
00930         //      body.m_shapeType = CollisionShape::SHAPE_PLANE;
00931                 m_planeBodyIndex = m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies;
00932         }
00933         //body.m_shapeType = shapeType;
00934         
00935         
00936         body.m_invMass = mass? 1.f/mass : 0.f;
00937     
00938         if (writeToGpu)
00939         {
00940                 m_data->m_bodyBufferGPU->copyFromHostPointer(&body,1,m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
00941         }
00942     
00943         b3InertiaData& shapeInfo = m_data->m_inertiaBufferCPU->at(m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
00944     
00945         if (mass==0.f)
00946         {
00947                 if (m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies==0)
00948                         m_static0Index = 0;
00949         
00950                 shapeInfo.m_initInvInertia.setValue(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00951                 shapeInfo.m_invInertiaWorld.setValue(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00952         } else
00953         {
00954         
00955                 b3Assert(body.m_collidableIdx>=0);
00956         
00957                 //approximate using the aabb of the shape
00958         
00959                 //Aabb aabb = (*m_data->m_shapePointers)[shapeIndex]->m_aabb;
00960                 b3Vector3 halfExtents = (aabbMax-aabbMin);//*0.5f;//fake larger inertia makes demos more stable ;-)
00961         
00962                 b3Vector3 localInertia;
00963         
00964                 float lx=2.f*halfExtents[0];
00965                 float ly=2.f*halfExtents[1];
00966                 float lz=2.f*halfExtents[2];
00967         
00968                 localInertia.setValue( (mass/12.0f) * (ly*ly + lz*lz),
00969                                    (mass/12.0f) * (lx*lx + lz*lz),
00970                                    (mass/12.0f) * (lx*lx + ly*ly));
00971         
00972                 b3Vector3 invLocalInertia;
00973                 invLocalInertia[0] = 1.f/localInertia[0];
00974                 invLocalInertia[1] = 1.f/localInertia[1];
00975                 invLocalInertia[2] = 1.f/localInertia[2];
00976                 invLocalInertia[3] = 0.f;
00977         
00978                 shapeInfo.m_initInvInertia.setValue(
00979                         invLocalInertia[0],             0,                                              0,
00980                         0,                                              invLocalInertia[1],             0,
00981                         0,                                              0,                                              invLocalInertia[2]);
00982 
00983                 b3Matrix3x3 m (body.m_quat);
00984 
00985                 shapeInfo.m_invInertiaWorld = m.scaled(invLocalInertia) * m.transpose();
00986         
00987         }
00988     
00989         if (writeToGpu)
00990                 m_data->m_inertiaBufferGPU->copyFromHostPointer(&shapeInfo,1,m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
00991     
00992     
00993     
00994         return m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies++;
00995 }
00996 
00997 int b3GpuNarrowPhase::getNumRigidBodies() const
00998 {
00999         return m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies;
01000 }
01001 
01002 void    b3GpuNarrowPhase::writeAllBodiesToGpu()
01003 {
01004 
01005         if (m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->size())
01006         {
01007                 m_data->m_localShapeAABBGPU->copyFromHost(*m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU);
01008         }
01009         
01010         
01011         m_data->m_gpuChildShapes->copyFromHost(m_data->m_cpuChildShapes);
01012         m_data->m_convexFacesGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_convexFaces);
01013         m_data->m_convexPolyhedraGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_convexPolyhedra);
01014         m_data->m_uniqueEdgesGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_uniqueEdges);
01015         m_data->m_convexVerticesGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_convexVertices);
01016         m_data->m_convexIndicesGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_convexIndices);
01017         m_data->m_bvhInfoGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_bvhInfoCPU);
01018         m_data->m_treeNodesGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_treeNodesCPU);
01019         m_data->m_subTreesGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_subTreesCPU);
01020 
01021 
01022         m_data->m_bodyBufferGPU->resize(m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
01023         m_data->m_inertiaBufferGPU->resize(m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
01024     
01025         if (m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies)
01026         {
01027                 m_data->m_bodyBufferGPU->copyFromHostPointer(&m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(0),m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
01028                 m_data->m_inertiaBufferGPU->copyFromHostPointer(&m_data->m_inertiaBufferCPU->at(0),m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
01029         }
01030     if (m_data->m_collidablesCPU.size())
01031         {
01032                 m_data->m_collidablesGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_collidablesCPU);
01033         }
01034         
01035     
01036 }
01037 
01038 
01039 void    b3GpuNarrowPhase::reset()
01040 {
01041         m_data->m_numAcceleratedShapes = 0;
01042         m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies = 0;
01043         this->m_static0Index = -1;
01044         m_data->m_uniqueEdges.resize(0);
01045         m_data->m_convexVertices.resize(0);
01046         m_data->m_convexPolyhedra.resize(0);
01047         m_data->m_convexIndices.resize(0);
01048         m_data->m_cpuChildShapes.resize(0);
01049         m_data->m_convexFaces.resize(0);
01050         m_data->m_collidablesCPU.resize(0);
01051         m_data->m_localShapeAABBCPU->resize(0);
01052         m_data->m_bvhData.resize(0);
01053         m_data->m_treeNodesCPU.resize(0);
01054         m_data->m_subTreesCPU.resize(0);
01055         m_data->m_bvhInfoCPU.resize(0);
01056 
01057 }
01058 
01059 
01060 void    b3GpuNarrowPhase::readbackAllBodiesToCpu()
01061 {
01062         m_data->m_bodyBufferGPU->copyToHostPointer(&m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(0),m_data->m_numAcceleratedRigidBodies);
01063 }
01064 
01065 void b3GpuNarrowPhase::setObjectTransformCpu(float* position, float* orientation , int bodyIndex)
01066 {
01067         if (bodyIndex>=0 && bodyIndex<m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->size())
01068         {
01069                 m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_pos=b3MakeVector3(position[0],position[1],position[2]);
01070                 m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_quat.setValue(orientation[0],orientation[1],orientation[2],orientation[3]);
01071         }
01072         else
01073         {
01074                 b3Warning("setObjectVelocityCpu out of range.\n");
01075         }
01076 }
01077 void b3GpuNarrowPhase::setObjectVelocityCpu(float* linVel, float* angVel, int bodyIndex)
01078 {
01079         if (bodyIndex>=0 && bodyIndex<m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->size())
01080         {
01081                 m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_linVel=b3MakeVector3(linVel[0],linVel[1],linVel[2]);
01082                 m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_angVel=b3MakeVector3(angVel[0],angVel[1],angVel[2]);
01083         } else
01084         {
01085                 b3Warning("setObjectVelocityCpu out of range.\n");
01086         }
01087 }
01088 
01089 bool b3GpuNarrowPhase::getObjectTransformFromCpu(float* position, float* orientation , int bodyIndex) const
01090 {
01091         if (bodyIndex>=0 && bodyIndex<m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->size())
01092         {
01093                 position[0] = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_pos.x;
01094                 position[1] = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_pos.y;
01095                 position[2] = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_pos.z;
01096                 position[3] = 1.f;//or 1
01097 
01098                 orientation[0] = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_quat.x;
01099                 orientation[1] = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_quat.y;
01100                 orientation[2] = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_quat.z;
01101                 orientation[3] = m_data->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(bodyIndex).m_quat.w;
01102                 return true;
01103         }
01104 
01105         b3Warning("getObjectTransformFromCpu out of range.\n");
01106         return false;
01107 }
